attributes.action: Change the way that ITeC trainee's are payed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people who are currently training at Wrexham ITeC have recently gone through a transition from fortnightly pay to monthly pay. Many believe that this transition was poorly managed and it has caused great inconveniences to many of the people there as they only receive the small amount of £50 per week. These are people who have that to buy food and pay for shelter and 30 day is a long time to wait for the next pay check when it is so small.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
